title: Division
text: Divide the leading term in the dividend by the leading term of the divisor. $$\frac{x^2}{x}=x$$
speech: Divide the leading term in the dividend by the leading term of the divisor.  fraction, x squared, over x,  is equal to x
pacedSpeech: Divide the leading term in the dividend by the leading term of the divisor.   fraction, x squared, over x,  is equal to x

title: Multiplication
text: Multiply the result by the divisor. $$x \left(x+8\right)=x^2+8x$$
speech: Multiply the result by the divisor.  x, parentheses x plus 8,  is equal to, x squared plus 8 x
pacedSpeech: Multiply the result by the divisor.   x,  x plus 8,  is equal to, x squared plus 8 x

title: Subtraction
text: Subtract the divident from the result. $$x^2+11x+16-x^2+8x=3x+16$$
speech: Subtract the divident from the result.  x squared plus 11 x plus 16 minus x squared plus 8 x is equal to, 3 x plus 16
pacedSpeech: Subtract the divident from the result.   x squared plus 11 x plus 16 minus x squared plus 8 x is equal to, 3 x plus 16

title: Division
text: Divide the leading term of the remainder. $$\frac{3x}{x}=3$$
speech: Divide the leading term of the remainder.  fraction, 3 x, over x,  is equal to 3
pacedSpeech: Divide the leading term of the remainder.   fraction, 3 x, over x,  is equal to 3

title: Multiplication
text: Multiply the result by the divisor. $$3\left(x+8\right)=3x+24$$
speech: Multiply the result by the divisor.  3 times, parentheses x plus 8,  is equal to, 3 x plus 24
pacedSpeech: Multiply the result by the divisor.   3 times,  x plus 8,  is equal to, 3 x plus 24

title: Subtraction
text: Subtract the remainder from the new result. $$3x+16-3x+24=-8$$
speech: Subtract the remainder from the new result.  3 x plus 16 minus 3 x plus 24 is equal to negative 8
pacedSpeech: Subtract the remainder from the new result.   3 x plus 16 minus 3 x plus 24 is equal to negative 8

title: Remainder
text: Since the degree of the remainder is less than the divisor, our last term is $$\frac{-8}{x+8}$$
speech: Since the degree of the remainder is less than the divisor, our last term is  fraction, negative 8, over, x plus 8,
pacedSpeech: Since the degree of the remainder is less than the divisor, our last term is   fraction, negative 8, over, x plus 8,

title: Division
text: What is our final result after combining all the terms?
speech: What is our final result after combining all the terms?
pacedSpeech: What is our final result after combining all the terms?

title: Division
speech: x plus 3 minus, fraction, 8 over, x plus 8,
pacedSpeech: x plus 3 minus, fraction, 8 over, x plus 8,
